terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.whatIsQueueDesc: Queue is a dynamic QR code system that allows you to change the content behind the code at any time, schedule experiences, and view usage data in real time.
terms.alphaVersionDesc: The system is currently in alpha version. This means the system may change from time to time, features may be added or modified, and there may be bugs or unexpected changes.
terms.contentResponsibilityDesc: Users are solely responsible for all content they upload to the system. Do not upload offensive, illegal content, or content that infringes copyrights.
terms.serviceRights: The service reserves the right to remove inappropriate content and block users who violate the terms of use.
terms.privacyDesc: The system collects anonymous usage data to improve the service and display analytics to users. We do not share personal information with third parties.
terms.liabilityDesc: The service is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We are not responsible for direct or indirect damages arising from use of the service.
terms.termsChangesDesc: We reserve the right to update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the service constitutes agreement to the updated terms.

modals.deleteWarning: This action will permanently remove all its media and cannot be undone!

modals.codesWillMoveToDashboard: Codes in this experience will be moved to the dashboard.

modals.riddleImagesSaved: Images will be saved to your library and count towards your storage
modals.riddleSelfieDescription:
Users can take and upload photos to a shared gallery.
Photos will be saved to your storage and appear in the gallery link.
modals.selfiebeamDragLogoHere: Drag logo here or click to add
modals.selfiebeamLogoDescription: Logo will be displayed in the gallery with user photos in a cyclic pattern
modals.wordCloudDescription: Create a word cloud in QuizyCloud and paste the link here.
modals.whatsappDescription: Add a WhatsApp group join button that appears to viewers after one second with animation.
modals.whatsappInvalidLink: Must be a valid WhatsApp link
modals.whatsappGetLinkInfo: Get the link from WhatsApp group settings
modals.scheduleSelectStartDate: Select a start date to configure the schedule
modals.scheduleMediaWillShow: Media will only show within the selected date and time range
modals.mediaLinkDescription: Add a link that appears as a button when the user clicks on the image. The user can choose to open the link or continue viewing.
modals.mediaLinkShowDomain: If no name is entered, the link domain will be displayed
modals.replaceMediaMultiple: This experience has {count} media items. The new file will replace the first one.
modals.replaceMediaConfirm: Are you sure you want to replace the file?
modals.addLinkDescription: Add a link as a separate media item. The link will be displayed as media in the viewer and redirect users to the external site.
modals.addLinkTitleNote: If no title is entered, the link domain will be displayed
